title: Here Are The Places Other Than Lips Your Girlfriend Wants To Be Kissed
text:
IN Lifestyle ON 07 Feb, 2017 Here Are The Places Other Than Lips Your Girlfriend Wants To Be Kissed Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Kissing is a vital part of making love and it is surely the most emotional expression of showing affection. As people kiss, oxytocin hormone is released, which is likely to reduce stress and increase feelings of attachment. Although it makes your partner extremely happy when you kiss her on lips, there are many other places where every girl secretly wants to be kissed at. 
Let's find those places out! Here Are The Places Other Than Lips Your Girlfriend Wants To Be Kissed 754 396 #-kiss-#neck-#girlfriend-# #stimulate-#turning-on Kissing as way of stimulation. 
When you start doing things other than just lip locking, it may work wonders for you and your intimate relationship. 1. Nape of the neck via 
The neck is considered as the most sensitive part of a girl's body in terms of sensuality. It may immediately turn her ON and send her shivers down the spine. Girls actually feel stimulated when kissed or gently nibbled at the neck. 2. Back of the neck 
Gentle massage or rub on the back of the neck may prove out to be a good way to turn her ON. This way you can improve ways of making love to her and shower her with all her desires. 3. Forehead 
You can tickle her on the ears and kiss it gently to give her immense pleasure. This may turn out to be a sweet way of turning her ON and giving her pleasure. 5. Hips via 
It is one of the most sensitive areas of the body. Rubbing gently and kissing can make her feel really pleasured. This sudden kick of sensuality is caused due to release of dopamine, oxytocin and serotonin hormones in our bodies. These hormones always leaves one craving for more. 6. Breasts 
This can be the most sensual way of stimulating her. Rubbing, kissing and gentle massaging will always leave her craving for more. You can start from neck and reach down slowly as she begins to have pleasure. Happy love making!
